content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Las Palmas 3.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Las Palmas 3.
Goal!  Almería 2, Las Palmas 3. Jeison Murillo (Las Palmas) header from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Francis Suárez with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Las Palmas. Conceded by Verza.
Attempt blocked. Francis Suárez (Las Palmas) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Iago Falque (Almería) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Iago Falque (Almería).
Thievy (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Enrique Corrales.

Foul by Aleix Vidal (Almería).
Hernán Santana (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Las Palmas. Francis Suárez replaces Dani Castellano.

Foul by Hernán Pellerano (Almería).
Thievy (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Almería. Rubén Suárez replaces Corona.

Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Deivid.

Attempt missed. Iago Falque (Almería) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Verza.
Attempt missed. Thievy (Las Palmas) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Momo with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Corona (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Iago Falque.

Mariano Barbosa (Las Palmas) is shown the yellow card.
Penalty missed! Bad penalty by Charles (Almería) right footed shot is close, but misses to the left. Charles should be disappointed.
Deivid (Las Palmas) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty Almería. Adrián Gunino draws a foul in the penalty area.

Attempt missed. Chumbi (Almería) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Aleix Vidal with a cross.

Substitution, Almería. Aleix Vidal replaces Christian Fernández.
Substitution, Almería. Chumbi replaces Carlos Calvo.
Second Half begins Almería 0, Las Palmas 2.
First Half ends, Almería 0, Las Palmas 2.
